name: Squandern't
description:
Should the server costs of the many multiverses become to much and the various forms of sentience compete to be the leader of the last one, who would come out on top? The Effigies so far advanced that the only remaining mystery to them is their own origin? Or the sleeping Stones for whom time itself waits for, neither remnants nor descendants of what came before.?

Squandern't is a 1v1 pvp game played with shared controls(Mouse/Keyboard), In which you alternate between a main game board and smaller minigames to take out your opponent. Be sure not to squander the few advantages you get.

  • Story/Design/Music/SFX: Nyiko Mucavele
  • Programming/Unity: Anton Los (Github) 

This game was developed in three months within Indiegame Development Lab at Bauhaus University 2022.
